months or a year a whole lot more than 200 bucks a month if he has to and so there's a lot of elasticity in that upper sliver of their user base and I think that's part of their plan to monetize but they also if they want iPhone level cash flow do need to figure out how to get ordinary users who either are not paying on the free plan or are paying 20 bucks a month to convert over to this
